price: Nao huwazuia watu, na wao wenyewe wanajitenga nayo. Nao hawaangamizi ila nafsi zao tu, wala wao hawatambui.
arabic: وَهُمۡ يَنۡهَوۡنَ عَنۡهُ وَيَنۡـَٔوۡنَ عَنۡهُۖ وَإِن يُهۡلِكُونَ إِلَّآ أَنفُسَهُمۡ وَمَا يَشۡعُرُونَ
footnotes: Wao huwazuia watu wasiiamini Qur'ani, na wao wenyewe hujitenga nayo. Inakuwa wao hawanafiiki, wala hawawachii wenginewe wakanafiika! Na kwa kitendo hicho hawadhuru ila nafsi zao, na wao hawatambui ubaya wa wayatendayo.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wahum yanhawna ʿanhu wayanawna ʿanhu wa-in yuh'likūna illā anfusahum wamā yashʿurūna
